name: Kanji Flash - Free Kanji Games
description:
Kanji Flash is a flash card game that will improve the ability to remember Japanese kanji. This game including 100 most used kanji in JLPT N5

Product features
  • 100 most used kanji in JLPT N5
  • Help to memorize Kanji Fast
  • More than 50+ Level
  • It's Free
